rows.attached_single_doc: That‚Äôs a good start! Look for small ways to relax, recognise your efforts, and reward yourself ‚Äì even little moments of self-care can make a big difference.
rows.text_1_facilitator:
Today's topic is about taking care of yourself. 

We often forget to take care of ourselves, but it's really important, especially if you are a parent! 

When we treat ourselves kindly and manage our stress, it helps both us and our children.

text_1_facilitator.eng:
Today's topic is about taking care of yourself. 

We often forget to take care of ourselves, but it's really important, especially if you are a parent! 

When we treat ourselves kindly and manage our stress, it helps both us and our children.

media_title.eng: How will caring for yourself help you and your family? Listen to find out

media_transcript.eng:
Greetings, everyone.

There are times when we experience challenges, face problems, and do not know what to do. It is important to take care of ourselves every day, so we are ready to handle those times well and stay calm. 

When we are calm, we are in a good state to think positively and come up with positive solutions to any challenges we may be facing.

rows.media_title: How will caring for yourself help you and your family? Listen to find out
rows.media_transcript:
Greetings, everyone.

There are times when we experience challenges, face problems, and do not know what to do. It is important to take care of ourselves every day, so we are ready to handle those times well and stay calm. 

When we are calm, we are in a good state to think positively and come up with positive solutions to any challenges we may be facing.

rows.text_1_facilitator: Let‚Äôs look at how @data.characters.f1_mother.name manages to take care of herself when life gets a bit too much.

text_1_facilitator.eng: Let‚Äôs look at how @data.characters.f1_mother.name manages to take care of herself when life gets a bit too much.

character_1_text.eng: @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name, come and play with me and my dolls!

character_2_text.eng: (ü§î_thinking_) I am feeling so stressed. Let me take a deep breath... Phewww‚Ä¶ Maybe I can finish cooking and then take a few minutes to play with @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name. It will take my mind off all these worries.

rows.character_1_text: @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name, come and play with me and my dolls!
rows.character_2_text: (ü§î_thinking_) I am feeling so stressed. Let me take a deep breath... Phewww‚Ä¶ Maybe I can finish cooking and then take a few minutes to play with @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name. It will take my mind off all these worries.

rows.character_1_text: Alright, @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name, let me finish dinner quickly, and then I will come play with you.

character_1_text.eng: Alright, @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name, let me finish dinner quickly, and then I will come play with you.

rows.character_1_text: What a pretty doll you have, @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name. Does she have a name?

character_1_text.eng: What a pretty doll you have, @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name. Does she have a name?

(ü§î_thinking_) What a day. I have a lot on my plate, but I am still standing and trying my best every day. Tomorrow, I should visit with my friends so we can catch up and be reminded that we aren't alone!

rows.character_1_text: (ü§î_thinking_) What a day. I have a lot on my plate, but I am still standing and trying my best every day. Tomorrow, I should visit with my friends so we can catch up and be reminded that we aren't alone!

rows.text_1_facilitator: @data.characters.f1_mother.name did a few things that can also help us when we are feeling overwhelmed.

text_1_facilitator.eng: @data.characters.f1_mother.name did a few things that can also help us when we are feeling overwhelmed.

text_2.eng:
@data.characters.f1_mother.name was able to care of herself because she: 
- ‚è∏Ô∏è Took a pause when she was feeling overwhelmed 
- ‚öΩ Played with her daughter, which helped her connect with @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name and feel less worried 
- üëèüèæ Praised herself for doing her best 
- üéÅ Rewarded herself with a cup of tea  
- üíú Made a plan to connect with a friend!

quiz_1_feedback_1.eng: Have another look at @data.characters.f1_mother.name‚Äôs facial expression and thoughts. She is feeling stressed and worried.

quiz_1_feedback_2.eng: Yes, @data.characters.f1_mother.name feels stressed and worried about everything happening in her life.

quiz_1_feedback_3.eng: Yes, @data.characters.f1_mother.name feels stressed and worried about everything happening in her life.

quiz_2_question.eng: How did @data.characters.f1_mother.name feel after doing something small for herself?

quiz_2_feedback_1.eng: Exactly! She is able to feel calmer for a moment and think more positively after creating a moment in the evening to enjoy a cup of tea by herself.

quiz_2_feedback_2.eng: She may still have the same worries, but she also recognises she is trying her best and others are there to support her.

quiz_2_feedback_3.eng: Have another look at the story. After taking care of herself, @data.characters.f1_mother.name feels more positive and hopeful.

rows.text_1_facilitator: Here are some tips to help you take care of yourself.

text_1_facilitator.eng: Here are some tips to help you take care of yourself.

section_1_text.eng: Taking a pause helps us to feel and respond calmer in stressful moments.

section_1_extra_text.eng:
Even taking a few deep breaths makes a big difference. 

By staying calm instead of reacting strongly, you can also prevent a lot of problems!

section_2_text.eng: Take a moment and think of one thing YOU did well recently. Say it aloud if you can: _"Well done for ‚Ä¶"_

section_2_extra_text.eng:
Being a parent can be hard. Praise yourself for trying your best. 

Identify negative thoughts when they start and decide if they are true or helpful. If not, find positive thoughts to replace them with. 

For example, instead of ‚ÄúI am a bad parent‚Äù say ‚ÄúI am feeling overwhelmed right now, but I am doing the best I can and I will talk to a friend for support‚Äù.

section_3_text.eng: What makes you happy? Find small things that you can do every day to care for yourself.

section_3_extra_text.eng: Doing something you enjoy will give you a short break. It will help you to think more clearly and care better for your family. Caring for yourself = caring for your family!

By staying calm instead of reacting strongly, you can also prevent a lot of problems!

Identify negative thoughts when they start and decide if they are true or helpful. If not, find positive thoughts to replace them with. 

For example, instead of ‚ÄúI am a bad parent‚Äù say ‚ÄúI am feeling overwhelmed right now, but I am doing the best I can and I will talk to a friend for support‚Äù.

rows.text_1_facilitator:
Now that you have learned a few tips to take care of yourself, let's put them into practice.

Think of one thing YOU have done well recently. Noticing your own effort makes a big difference!

text_1_facilitator.eng:
Now that you have learned a few tips to take care of yourself, let's put them into practice.

Think of one thing YOU have done well recently. Noticing your own effort makes a big difference!

quiz_1_feedback_1.eng:
Say it aloud if you can.

Here is one thing you deserve praise for: Well done for using @global.app_name!

rows.text_1_facilitator:
This week's home activity is to take care of yourself! Whenever you can, pause, praise your efforts and reward yourself. And remember to connect with your family and friends ‚Äì you are not alone.

Care for yourself every day. You matter!

text_1_facilitator.eng:
This week's home activity is to take care of yourself! Whenever you can, pause, praise your efforts and reward yourself. And remember to connect with your family and friends ‚Äì you are not alone.

Care for yourself every day. You matter!

media_transcript.eng:
For me as a parent, it was almost impossible to find time for myself. I was always busy taking care of everyone else. Through @global.app_name, I realised how important it is to take care of myself. It helps me AND my family! 

Having a moment for myself helps me to breathe and notice how I feel. Even five minutes to have a cup of tea makes a big difference. Now I can deal with my stress better.

quiz_1_question.eng: Can you find moments this week to pause, praise your efforts, and reward yourself?

quiz_1_feedback_1.eng: That's great! Every small step you take to care for yourself makes a big difference for your family.

quiz_1_feedback_2.eng: That‚Äôs a good start! Look for small ways to relax, recognise your efforts, and reward yourself ‚Äì even little moments of self-care can make a big difference.

quiz_1_feedback_3.eng: That's okay. Try choosing one small, simple action like taking a deep breath or sitting quietly for a moment. Every little bit counts!
